ygData.subject: RE: Gimmee Gimmee!
ygData.msgSnippet: I just inherited all of Windsong s old stuff. (Good friend RL.) and was running through the newbie areas looting all the unlooted corpses (no one cleans up
ygData.messageBody:
I just inherited all of Windsong's old stuff. (Good friend RL.) and
was running through the newbie areas looting all the unlooted corpses
(no one cleans up after themselves anymore!) And I had a Barbarian stop
me and say "Do you want big pp for your bronze greaves?"

And I said "No"

"How about for your gauntlets"
(they are elf-hide gloves...)
"No. They were gifts. I don't sell gifts."

Finally he left me alone.

But... I didn't know him. He just thought he could buy anything I was
wearing,
like that!

Sarah Heacock sarah@...
Meara, level 13 Enchanter, Master Jeweler, owner Meara's Boutique of
Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faerain, level 18 Soldier of Tunare, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
Faesong, level 7 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro, Phoenix, Solusek Ro
(Blackburrow -- when I get back from Kelethin)

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Ryan Honeyman [mailto:honeyman@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, February 09, 2000 3:24 PM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Gimmee Gimmee!
>
>
>From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
>> Hey, Harmonic! I hear you have some Lambent Bracers? (I didn't say I
>> didn't do it with my *primary* character, did I?)
>
> How much you paying me for them? ;-)
>
> What's silly is when players come up to me and ask me about my Imbrued
> and then start offering like 100pp or 200pp for a piece. Or how much
> for the Six Note Blade? The other thing that really floors me is those
> people who insist on me letting them hold something of mine to 'try it
> out'. One guy inspected me, and asked me how much for the Cloak of
> Shadows I was wearing... jeez, hello, *knock knock* I'm freakin using
> it... hello, anybody home?? hehe. ah well. <g>
>
> Harmonic.
>
>
